PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2018-10202018-07-18,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActBusiness Development Bank of Canada Act
Financial Administration Act
SubjectOrder designating the Minister of Small Business and Tourism, a member of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada, (1) as the Designated Minister for the purposes of the Business Development Bank of Canada Act; and (2) as the appropriate Minister with respect to the Business Development Bank of Canada for the purposes of the Financial Administration Act
PrecisOrder (1) Repealing Order in Council P.C. 1997-1214 of August 28, 1997; (2) Designating the Minister of Small Business and Tourism, a member of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada, as the Designated Minister for the purposes of the BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT BANK OF CANADA ACT; and (3) Designating the Minister of Small Business and Tourism, a member of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada, as the appropriate Minister with respect to the Business Development Bank of Canada for the purposes of the FINANCIAL ADMINISTRATION ACT.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2018-0075 Publication Date: 2018-08-08
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Business Development Bank of Canada ActFinancial Administration Act
subject: Order designating the Minister of Small Business and Tourism, a member of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada,  (1) as the Designated Minister for the purposes of the Business Development Bank of Canada Act; and (2) as the appropriate Minister with respect to the Business Development Bank of Canada for the purposes of the Financial Administration Act
precis: Order (1) Repealing Order in Council P.C. 1997-1214 of August 28, 1997; (2) Designating the Minister of Small Business and Tourism, a member of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada, as the Designated Minister for the purposes of the BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT BANK OF CANADA ACT; and (3) Designating the Minister of Small Business and Tourism, a member of the Queen’s Privy Council for Canada, as the appropriate Minister with respect to the Business Development Bank of Canada for the purposes of the FINANCIAL ADMINISTRATION ACT.
